description: Folsom Lake Colleges Spring 2017 semester officially begins on Saturday, January 14th. Saturday and online classes (full term, 1st 8-week, and 1st 5-week) will begin- check with your instructor. FLC will be closed on Monday, January 16th for Martin Luther King, Jr.s birthday. Most classes will have their first session Tuesday, January 17th-Monday, January 23rd.
title: Spring semester officially begins

description: Folsom Lake College (including the El Dorado Center and Rancho Cordova Center) is closed in observance of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.s birthday on Monday, January 16th. No classes will be held.Folsom Lake Colleges Spring 2017 semester officially begins on Saturday, January 14th. Saturday classes and online classes (full term, 1st 8-week, and 1st 5-week) will begin- check with your instructor. Most classes will begin Tues., Jan. 17 - Mon., Jan. 23.
title: MLK Jr. Holiday (college closed)

description:
Garden Work at Wakamatsu
Jan. 16 - MLK Day 

Help expand and enhance the community garden and the native plant demonstration garden. Install native plants along the NEW mile-long trail at the farm to enhance our native food forest!

RSVP at http://bit.ly/MLKDay17 so that we can be sure to follow up with more details about the service day project in early January.
title: FLC Hiking Club

description: Kick off the semester at FLC with a little celebration and by getting to know your Associated Students representatives, student services available to you, and clubs you can join.
title: Falcons Day @ Folsom
